about_the_game:
A colony of Bugs living in the basement of a house is running out of food. The elder sends a search group to retrieve the mystical sauce from the kitchen. There are legends that this sauce allows cockroaches to mutate and become stronger. Can you survive in the kitchen and come back a winner?

Interact with your Bugs-friends and random passerby as you mission! They will give you information that help you, and you can get even closer to kitchen goal!

RISE OF THE BUGS features a branch of improve and mutations of the Bugs. Unlock new playable characters as you progress through the game. Each of them has unique animations and new capabilities.

Switch to unlocked Bug while playing on any level!

Collect drops of mutated sauce scattered throughout the levels to upgrade new characters and switch between them. Interact with surrounding objects on the levels and complete your adventure in different ways!

short_description: RISE OF THE BUGS is a 2D pixel art adventure game about annoying bugs. Lead a colony in search of new food, discover the secrets of mutation and escape from the angry men on the kitchen. Will you be able to steal the mysterious sauce or you die crushed under a slipper?
